text: haey karosanyea pitabrakd( thngai barlok) ban chit mk dl . pelnoh chakkho robsa puok del kmean chomnue samlung meul( hetokar teangnih daoy niyeay tha) ao vineasa a nd reay haey puok yeung. chea karpit nasa puok yeung ban the v sa brahesa ampi rueng nih . phtoy towvinh puok yeung chea puok del ban bampean
